qas.question: How many credits were needed for an M.Sc. (Tech.) degree before the Bologna Process?
How many credits were needed for an M.Sc. from a traditional university prior to the Bologna Process?

context: Universities of Technology are academically similar to other (non-polytechnic) universities. Prior to Bologna process, M.Sc. (Tech.) required <a0_0>180<a0_0/> credits, whereas M.Sc. from a normal university required <a1_0>160<a1_0/> credits. The credits between Universities of Technology and normal universities are comparable.
